cards.flavor:
“I've never seen the sentinels in the bay so restless. A bad omen, to be sure.”
—Helena, Yroncaster guard
cards.name: Tidecrest Surger
cards.text:
When this creature enters, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
{2}{U}: This creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: A single moment of time lost is all that can stand between victory and defeat.
cards.name: Timely Arrival
cards.text:
Counter target spell if it has mana value 2 or less or if this spell was foretold.
Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

cards.flavor: “I'd rather the dead desecrate all our cranns than see them allied with the humans.”
cards.name: Treacherous Bloodbriar
cards.text:
When this creature enters, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
Arise {2}{B}{B} ({2}{B}{B}, Exile this from your graveyard as a sorcery: Create a black token copy of it that's also a Zombie and can't block.)

cards.name: Undermine, the Seething Forges
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if there are eight or more nonland cards in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{R}{R} and exile this land. When you do, it deals 5 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: The dead tore down Gamhaugen, but the ground it stood on would not give way so easily.
cards.name: Undermine Guardian
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a non-Dwarf spell or plays a non-Mountain land, this creature deals 2 damage to that player.
{1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Dwarf or Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Underpass Ranger
cards.text:
When this creature enters, search your library for a creature card with mana value 1 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Arise {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Exile this from your graveyard as a sorcery: Create a black token copy of it that's also a Zombie and can't block.)

cards.name: Unravel the Unfathomable
cards.text:
Draw a card. If this spell was foretold, instead surveil 2, then draw two cards.
Foretell {2}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

cards.flavor:
“You are free to cling to whatever meager scraps of hope you have left, Asamund. It will make it all the sweeter when I tear them all down.”
—Yaran, Undying Usurper
cards.name: Usurper's Will
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}. If there are four or more counters among creatures you control, counter that spell instead.

cards.flavor: Her life for her queen's, always.
cards.name: Vel, the Forlorn Shield
cards.text:
Lifelink
When Vel enters, choose up to one other target nonland permanent. If you gained or lost life this turn, exile that permanent until Vel leaves the battlefield.

cards.flavor: As Yaran's black blade struck at Asamund's heart, Vel lept in front of her queen one final time.
cards.name: Vel's Intervention
cards.text:
Siphon (Each -1/-1 counter you put on your creatures up to their remaining toughness while casting this pays for {1}.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Vengeful Alchemist
cards.text:
Whenever another creature you control dies, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice another creature. If you do, this creature gains menace until end of turn.

cards.flavor: From old death, new life.
cards.name: Vernal Decay
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater attacks, it gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may pay 1 life. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Voracious Dais
cards.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card. If that creature had flying, put a flying counter on a creature you control. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

cards.flavor: Count Belmord's castle plays host to his personal entourage of bloodthirsty bats.
cards.name: Warden of the Belfry
cards.text: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying and “This creature can't block.”

cards.flavor: The zombie warlord Weoran led Yaran's newly raised undead battalion across the dwarven mountains, seeking to snuff out the stalwart and deep-dwelling race.
cards.name: Weoran's Hunger
cards.text: Put two -1/-1 counters on target creature.

cards.flavor:
“Ah, such wanton gluttony! An abomination after our own hearts!”
—Corpus, Drawn to Death
cards.name: Weoran the Fleshcarver
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever Weoran enters or attacks, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card. If that creature card had toughness 4 or greater, you gain 4 life.

cards.name: Wihtfyr's Coterie
cards.text:
{2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent discards a card. Activate only during your turn.
When this creature dies, exile target card from a graveyard. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Wihtfyr of the Nighthost
cards.text:
First strike, menace, lifelink
{X}{2}{B}, Discard Wihtfyr: Create a tapped 0/0 Skeleton Army creature token with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.” For each of up to X Armies, put your choice of a first strike, lifelink, or menace counter on that Army.

cards.name: Yaran, Undying Usurper
cards.text:
Flying, deathtouch
Whenever Yaran enters or attacks, target opponent may pay 3 life. If that player doesn't, they choose a nonland permanent they control. Tap that permanent. You gain control of it. (This effect doesn't end.)

cards.flavor: Aravanti subterfuge gathered intelligence on the state of the kingdoms of Meredir after the Rose War, and where Yaran's legions should strike.
cards.name: Yaran's Scheming
cards.text: Draw two cards, then you may discard a card. If you do, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.flavor:
“While I can still say this, dear Mira. . .”
—Betha, Yroncaster knight
cards.name: Yearning Heart
cards.text: Target creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. That creature seeks secrets. (Give it that Oath Aura. Fulfill it by attacking with it and two or more other creatures to draw a card.)

cards.flavor: With Asamund gone, her throne sat empty. What would fate have in store for Meredir's people now?
cards.name: Yroncaster's Empty Throne
cards.text:
As long as you control exactly one legendary creature, that creature has hexproof and indestructible.
{1}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: You gain 2 life. If the exiled card was legendary, draw a card.
